meanings.definition: Inflicting harm in return for a wrong or injury.
meanings.sent1: The avenging hero sought justice for the hurt villagers.
meanings.sent2: The avenging warrior was determined to right the wrongs done to his people.
meanings.sent3: The avenging cat knocked over the vase in retaliation for being ignored.
meanings.sent4: The avenging storm unleashed its fury on the unsuspecting town.
meanings.sent5: The avenging fire consumed everything in its path, leaving destruction in its wake.

meanings.definition: Seeking revenge for a perceived injustice.
meanings.sent1: The avenging spirit haunted the halls of the old mansion, seeking retribution.
meanings.sent2: The avenging victim plotted their revenge against those who wronged them.
meanings.sent3: The avenging squirrel stole all the nuts from the bird feeder as payback.
meanings.sent4: The avenging shadow followed the culprit, ready to strike at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The avenging ghost whispered curses in the ears of those who had betrayed it.
